channel.title: The Capable Snakekeeper and all his wrongdoings
channel.description: Recent content on The Capable Snakekeeper and all his wrongdoings

item.title: Meshing Around
item.description: Dynamic Adaptive Tessellation using D3D12 Mesh Shaders

item.title: Hi Ember!
item.description: Ember from Pixar’s Elemental created entirely procedurally! Tons of noise, toolbox functions, and basic shader art.

item.title: CUDA Boids
item.description: A GPU implementation of Craig Reynolds’ model of flocking for boids using C++ and CUDA.

item.title: WandaVision themed Minecraft
item.description: Procedurally generated Minecrat terrain with post-process effects matching the theme of my favourite Marvel TV show, WandaVision.
